snippet.title: THE SETTLERS  HISTORY COLLECTION - LAUNCH TRAILER
snippet.description:
The Settlers History Collection is now available on Uplay and Ubisoft Store !
The History Collection will include History Editions of all seven previous Settlers games, which includes gold versions of each game with all expansions, game improvements, and optimization for modern PC systems.
All seven games will also be available separately as History Editions.


Ubisoft Store: http://ubi.li/wawr7


More info: http://thesettlers.com/historycollection
